allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
[Learning] 住驻转 SKILL  专转 驻专拽

- 爪专转 SKILL 转拽转 .claude/commands/learn.md
- 住驻转 CLAUDE.md 注 专转 驻专拽
- 专转  -commit   push

 Generated with Claude Code

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
[Learning] 转拽  SKILL 驻专 

- 住驻转 YAML frontmatter 注 metadata
- 专转 allowed-tools  住驻爪驻
- 砖砖 -$ARGUMENTS 拽转 驻专专
- 住驻转 !`bash` 专爪转 驻拽转  转

 Generated with Claude Code

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
